name: Flight of the Blazing Sparrow Hawk
name_original: Flight of the Blazing Sparrow Hawk
description:
This is an overhead action game of 30 levels.  You take flight as a sparrow hawk to save fairies from an evil empire.  Each fairy is trapped in a crystal.  You can save them by destroying all of the crystals that powers the crystal which traps them.  This game features:

1.  30 levels of action

2.  many goblins

3.  CANNONS!

4.  very good epic music
